article: afghan president hamid karzai said saturday that he was in `` full agreement '' with president obama 's newly announced strategy for afghanistan , saying it was `` exactly what the afghan people were hoping for '' and promising to `` work very closely '' with the united states to implement the plan .
abstract: karzai signals support of new u.s. strategy
